name: Block Breaker 2D (Ryan)
description:
Block Breaker 2D is an arkanoid style game .

 The game has 5 levels all based on the central mass design.

Destroy all block to progress through to the next level. Blocks range from :

Blue = 1 Hit 

Red = 2 Hit 

Purple = 3 Hit 

Grey = Unbreakable 

Play game in full screen

Block assets are provided by https://kenney.nl/
